remarks: Two elements in a half-open interval have separation _strictly_ less than the difference between the endpoints.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 12-Sep-2014.)
statement: icodiamlt $p |- ( ( ( A e. RR /\ B e. RR ) /\ ( C e. ( A [,) B ) /\ D e. ( A [,) B ) ) ) -> ( abs ` ( C - D ) ) < ( B - A ) ) $.
